faq.faqq: I activated my license but my Evoq website still says that I am on the trial version.
faq.faqa: See Troubleshoot: Nag message still appears after license activation

faq.faqq: Can I activate a license on a server without internet access?
How do I view my available licenses?
faq.faqa: Go to Host Advanced Settings License Management, and then search for your email address or invoice number.

faq.faqq: How do I recover a production license that was inadvertently activated in a local development environment?
How do I delete an activated development license in my local server?
faq.faqa: While logged in as Host, go to Host Advanced Settings License Management, then delete the license from the list.
